metadata.name: London
metadata.description:
Let me tell you about my adventure in the English capital.

During my stay, the good people of London, well primarily children, seemed gravely concerned about the structural integrity of a clearly beloved bridge.

The little ones clamored with no avail “London bridge is falling down”, and it seemed to me that none of the adults understood the gravity of the situation.

So, being the ever helpful, good-natured Trans Giraffe that I am, I lent my energies to the youngsters’ cause and the crisis was miraculously averted.

How we succeeded, I do not know, but I can say with 100% certainty that the London Bridge is standing intact.

P.S.: do indulge my vanity friends, say, don’t I look dashing, post victory, in a London sunset?
